mapper.select: SELECT a.name as name, a.surname as surname, a.birthdate as birthdate, a.gender as gender, b.name as nameSubcategory, c.name as nameCategory, a.tx_id as txId, a.tx_host as txHost, a.tx_user as txUserId, a.tx_date as txDate, a.tx_update as txUpdate FROM user a, category b, subcategory c, profile d, profile_subcategory e WHERE a.user_id= #{userId} and a.user_id=d.user_id and d.profile_id=e.profile_id and c.subcategory_id=e.subcategory_id and c.category_id= b.category_id
